summary: With his cop companion shot and killed by terrorists, Reno The Dog pairs up with tough cop Jake in thwarting the criminal organization.
cast: Chuck Norris|Michele Lamar Richards|Erik von Detten|Carmine Caridi|Clyde Kusatsu|Kai Wulff|Peter Savard Moore|Timothy Bottoms|Francesco Quinn|Herta Ware|John Kerry|Hank Baumert|Linda Castro|John Sistrunk|Bob Bastanchury|Kent Rizley|Eric Norris|Tony Ferrandini|Karalee Austin|Jack Banning|Jim Ingham|Bill Dunnam|Michelangelo Kowalski|Ron Johnson|Tom Steinmetz|Barbara Savage|Eileen Bowman|Carey Scott|Noah Michael Levine|Fred Bailey|Dean Raphael Ferrandini|Bill Brinsfield|Dana Byrne|John Chapon|Greg Benson|Betty|John DaSilva|Chase Jazzborne|David R. Knight|John Moskop|Mark Stanley Perich|Lorenzo Porricelli|R. Ruddell Weatherwax|Robert Werhan|Roy Werner
title: Top Dog: El perro sargento
